website_summaries.verdict: The Stan Smith sneaker is a classic (or retro) Adidas model many customers remember wearing. Just as fashionable as it is functional, but also comfortable and durable.
pros: Classic design, can be casual or sport shoe
cons: Arch support is lacking, unlike originals
Fit is true to size, but narrow

customer_reviews.title: Real or fake??
customer_reviews.text: I’m questioning the authenticity of these shoes. The sole has a tint of pink. The amazon picture shows 7 shoelace holes but the one I received only has 6 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Legitreviewsforyou

customer_reviews.title: Buy your Stan Smith shoes from a known vendor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not purchased directly from Adidas. I have purchased three pair of Stan Smith directly from Adidas. My size was not available at Adidas at the time I ordered this pair from another vendor. These shoes were designed slightly different, the toe box was more pointed than the Adidas I have owned or currently own. The size was the same but these shoes were tighter than Stan Smith shoes purchased directly from Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M H

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: I fully believe these we cheap knockoffs made in China. I bought a pair in a store and they fit perfectly but these were too big and the size chart wasn't the same as the exact same shoe I bought in the store. The label was blurry and hard to read. Do not buy these amazing shoes from anyone but a reputable store, not through Amazon if this is the kind of crap they will send you.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D Ray

customer_reviews.title: A, "DYNAMITE", classic sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my shipment of the "CLASSIC", Adidas Stan Smith Sneaker! They look fabulous and I can't wait to wear them out in the public, officially! I brought them to wear with some recently purchased Boston Celtics apparel that I found on sale, even though I am a New York Knickerbockers fan! ..... I just like looking, "SHARP" and dressing color coordinated, sometimes, whether I'm dressed formal or I'm taking it easy, leisurely; hanging out! I have no complaints with this purchase and I would recommend this particular sneaker for purchasing, from this vendor, to anyone! The price was affordable and it was delivered several hours before it was due, "KUDOS", I love that! "THANKS"
customer_reviews.author: Vannie Kerr Jr

customer_reviews.title: Adidas classic won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: The Stan Smith has been one of Adidas best selling sneakers, for decades, for a a reason. It's a clean, classic, versatile design that won't disappoint. Stan Smith's are comfortable, look good in shorts, jeans, chinos or a suit, and they never go out of style. I bought mine in "used, like new" condition through Amazon Marketplace, and they arrived brand new! An all time classic.
customer_reviews.author: Treg G.

customer_reviews.title: The product is marketed as new but is used.
customer_reviews.text: The product was used but advertised as new. It did not even come with the original adidas box. I understand a previous buyer may have returned after trying on but these shoes were well worn. There were wear creases in the side of the shoe. The soles had mud on them, disgusting. See the pictures provided. No faith in this shoe seller and will not be purchasing from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: different qualities left and right shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've had this shoes for 10 months, the right shoe sole is totally broken with a big hole, the left shoe is perfect, almost like new. I have to drop the pair to the trash...
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gil

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fast shipping!!! Excellent transaction!!! Authentic Adidas Stan Smiths!!!! Definitely authentic, no worries of authenticity here people!!,, no knock offs here!! Very comfortable as well!! Thanks very much!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Classic sneakers, comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: A classic white sneaker. Looks great and is comfortable. Ordered four pairs for my groomsman and they received numerous compliments with their fitted grey suits. Nice padding in the heel, although this does make the shoe feel clunkier. Seems durable so far. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sizing wrong
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the shoes I was under the impression it was a women’s size. Tried them on and they were big (I wear a US women’s 6.5-7.5 depending). They were actually a men’s US size 7. Disappointed I had to return to them - While I did order the right size i don’t think the size showed in Mens. I did return them. When I went to order the the women’s size the price jumped up$20. So I went to the the Adidas site and order them. I’m really reviewing the site description. The shoes themselves are awesome - super comfortable once I got the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Steal
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased Stan smiths a couple of years ago from the Adidas store when they started to become really popular and spent close to if not $100 on them. Got these for $40. Wonderful deal for a comfortable sneaker that goes well with any outfit. And these are authentic as I have compared them to my old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice classic Stan Smith shoes
customer_reviews.text: This use to be my go to shoes. Owned about 4 pairs of Stan Smiths over the years. These were the first pair I've owned in about 25 years & they still feel the same. Love this shoe. I'd read reviews that stated that these shoes were not what they used to be, but I couldn't tell any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the last pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for a pair I bought about 3 years ago. They seem to be not as well made. The leather seems thinner and the insoles are warped and were floating around loose inside the shoes. When you put your foot in you have make sure the insoles are all the way back and they lay down as you put the shoe on. Like someone forgot to glue them down.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Practical & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Adidas shoes for over 45 years so I have the sizing down. These shoes are excellent court shoes that are durable and comfortable. Leather uppers with ventilation keeps your foot in place and cool when starting and stopping quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Laskowski

customer_reviews.title: Prices always changing
customer_reviews.text: Havent tried on yet but i ordered red and white because yellow and white was almost $10 more for same shoe. I got my order and looked up the shoes again and now yellow and white is $5 less than when i ordered the red and whites. Major bummer. Still a good deal for under $40 and in size 14.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit great and they look even better. If we ever get back to normal I will be wearing them to work.
customer_reviews.author: jeff merkin

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for Obama, good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: When I saw Obama wearing these shoes I figured I needed a pair. They look pretty sharp and are comfortable. They are my first pair of Addidas ever.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great adidas. They feel nice.
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice in person compared to the online pictures and they fit just right. I will say i didn't expect them to be bulky compared to my usual shoes, which are vans and nikes. But i dont mind, they look nice, i just didnt expect the bulkiness lol. Also, if you're going to get these type of shoes, take care of them really good. Ive only wore them once and they already have creases which doesn't look good at all. But it was probably because i walked a lot the time i wore them but at the same time they shouldn't ruin that easily for $60-$75.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable because of the stitching
customer_reviews.text: can't wear. very uncomfortable for left foot. Hurts toe in two places because of stitching and crease of shoe when walking. Never buy again. Have Rod Laver from Adidas and very comfortable but mesh and not leather. these feel very although the leather is very tough. "Old Cow"
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gerald B. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Thin width sole but actually Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars only because my son doesn’t have wide feet but the sole is too thin. I purchased the size 17 & 18. Yes, his feet are that big!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the classic ones of old, they're not super high quality. Some wrinkles in the leather. But, they look really good. I got a half sized larger than what I call "my size" because these are replacing a pair of Somoa's that were just too small and hurt my feet. I could probably have gotten that half size smaller, but my heel doesn't slip so I'm keeping the size I ordered. They look great with shorts, great with jeans & casual twill pants.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: You just have to be so careful not to get it dirty, it's kind of stressful
customer_reviews.text: you really have to do a lot of upkeep to keep it clean obviously. if you waver or are too lazy to clean it, you might get an ugly stain. You just have to be so careful not to get it dirty,it's kind of stressful. As long as you're not gonna be on the road or outside ever, these shoes will hold up fine but if you're an outdoorsy person or run a lot, these will rarely get used.
customer_reviews.author: Krishnan Ganapathy

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Stan Smith Original
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Adidas Originals since high school. Definitely a good quality shoe. However, the Stan Smith's that I purchased run a bit narrow for me. They do run your normal size but I went up a half size for extreme comfort. The store I purchased from on Amazon delivered quickly and the shoe is authentic.
customer_reviews.author: DHaynes

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: So I wore these with no-show socks, and the rear of the shoe is so high and rigid that it actually tore up my heel, leaving a helluva blister. I tried wearing higher socks, and it was pretty much just as uncomfortable. They are good looking, stylish shoes, but very very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: STILL a perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes, over many years have purchased for all family members, mom, dad, son, daughter. These are for 25 year old son, look great. Sharp shoe.
customer_reviews.author: connie cn

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I bought two pair and a third for my Dad. I wore these in college in the 80’s and catching these on sale was a coup! Still great fit, still great quality, still a classic!
customer_reviews.author: SNAABY

customer_reviews.title: Know your size first
customer_reviews.text: Would suggest to try at a store first to know exactly the sie you need, its weird that I need two different sizes 9 for sneakers and 10 for soccer cleats. Besides that shoes look great and feel great. The box was a total mess
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: padding could be better
customer_reviews.text: I'm 56....I grew up in the original Stan Smiths....played hundreds of sets of tennis in these shoes. These....not what I remember. Biggest issues so far is that the shoe rubs on the ankle bone. Quite uncomfortable. Secondly, the tongue has zero padding. They are exactly the look I wanted, but whether I can play one game of tennis in them is doubtful.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a STEAL!!!!! Usually the Stan Smith Addidas shoes range from 70-100 but I was able to get them for only 41. The package came in two days and they fit perfectly. I wear them everywhere and they go with all kinds of clothes (jeans, shorts, sweatpants). They are really white and probably look better with a bit of dirt on them, but I am not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: ddanzger

customer_reviews.title: Love my adidas
customer_reviews.text: Adidas never disappoints, stylish and good quality, this has been my brand since I was a teenager, they only complaint I have is them having Kanye associated with them
customer_reviews.author: Inktlyd

customer_reviews.title: It seems that Adidas is starting to make their shoes more narrow or my feet are getting more hobbit like than before
customer_reviews.text: I usually by my Adidas at a size 13 because the width of my foot. It seems that Adidas is starting to make their shoes more narrow or my feet are getting more hobbit like than before. 3 stars because these 3 strips would still be comfortable on my walk to Mordor.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Classic Comfort and Value
customer_reviews.text: I like the good fit and timeless looks of my Stan Smiths. They are exactly what I wanted for a casual look, or the option to upgrade them to a little dressier look when needed. The shoes fit great and were comfortable from the moment I put them on. The price was a very good value compared to many similar sneakers for multiples of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: it's still a great shoe to play tennis in
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe very much... I've been wearing it since the 70's! The manufacturer has changed the recipe and construction a bit but it's still a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D.Steiner

customer_reviews.title: I've seen better knock offs
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looks good and will be worn as a street shoe only. They are NOT leather and are NOT Original Stan Smith court shoes. I ordered a 1/2 size larger and they fit ok. Definitely would NOT work as a tennis shoe. On the positive side, Amazon delivery was one day and not two, Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Kent Kortsen

customer_reviews.title: This shoe runs large seller wants $30 more to exchange 😡
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our grandson these shoes run big so I tried to exchange it for a size smaller & seller wanted to charge me $30 more that's bs . So I will order on Zappos that's a good way to lose customers adidas 😡
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT SHOEMAKER

customer_reviews.title: good fit, leather top that breathes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tennis shoe in my youth, loved it then,. Never thought it would be offered again, about 50 years later. Fits as expecteed, great for tennis or squash. I can reommend it without any hesitation, period!
customer_reviews.author: Horst Stehmer

customer_reviews.title: It's a soft leather and it's quite good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a soft leather and it's quite good for the price. I've seen a lot of other leather shoes and its made of this garbage leather glued together (genuine leather) and unless you were paying 150 dollars for it, you weren't getting a decent pair of quality leather shoes. This however, is great for the entry level white sneaker shoes. Looks great, comfortable, quality, and affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stan Smiths are a classic for a reason
customer_reviews.text: These timelessly stylish shoes look great and are very comfortable. A couple of comments about the fit: they seem a bit narrow for a men's D width, and they have no arch support. With a store bought arch support, however, they're great. Just keep in mind that you may need to adjust your sizing if you need to add arch inserts.
customer_reviews.author: hockeymania

customer_reviews.title: Look great, needs some breaking in
customer_reviews.text: These were uncomfortable the first couple times I wore them, but after that they were good. I wore these shoes walking up and down the Las Vegas strip for 3 days and did well. They still need some breaking in but given I only wore them a couple times before the Vegas trip they pass the test. Of course they look great, goes without question.
customer_reviews.author: Poppabear

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, one recommendation I wished I had followed is since they are white, spray them with a product like sof sole waterproofer spray before you wear them. White shoes get dirty but it will make it easy to clean off and keep them white. Just a tip I wished I had followed on my current pair.
customer_reviews.author: DaLish

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes -- i go to the university of ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes -- i go to the university of wisconsin-madison and the all red color is PERFECT for school spirit, but they can be worn in many other occasions as well (i love doing a plain white tee, jeans, and then these shoes as a stand out piece). i always get compliments when i wear them because the all red aesthetic is so unique and cool! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. I always feel nostalgic when wearing them. That crisp clean look always keep me coming back to Stan Smith.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shoes, awesome quality and feel, super comfortable. Highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: anderson caviedes

customer_reviews.title: Stan the man smiths
customer_reviews.text: Stan Smith are great shoes dating back for a long time. Everyone loves the Smiths and you will be the hit of any meeting with your Smiths.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Stan Smith!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Do not hesitate. Authentic Adidas Stan Smith!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A shoe that will travel through time
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Stan Smith Adidas since the 70s when it ain't broke don't fix it it's a perfect tennis shoe for all around life..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Piche'

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sneakers...
customer_reviews.text: I like these sneakers i don't wear them often but when i do i want something unique... Couldn't beleive the price i got them for i will watch for more deals from this seller.. thanks
customer_reviews.author: S. willis

customer_reviews.title: Nice retro kicks
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve purchased for my husband after he wore the first pair completely out. He likes these b/c he wore the same shoes in the early 1980s 😁
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Dayz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new kicks! I considered buying it years ago but I procrastinated until I forgot. Then while browsing at Amazon I came across the product, read the reviews, price comparisons (and else where), etc. To make a long story short, I like wearing it in-style.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis shoe that has stood the test of time . Well made and super comfortable shoes. Great customer service with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: 1972 all over again
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when they first came out in 1972, but could not afford them back then. I like the look, haven’t played in them yet...still trying to wear them in
customer_reviews.author: Beach babe

customer_reviews.title: Not the same shoe anymore. Back they went
customer_reviews.text: These were no good. I've been wearing Stan Smith millenials for 25 years and now on these they changed the last and it feels like they cheapened them up. I returned them
customer_reviews.author: DSF

customer_reviews.title: Stan Smith
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneakers I have been wearing them for years Fit good & Look good
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: classic shoe - timeless fashion
customer_reviews.text: perfect for nastalgic boomers and those with enough self awareness to not be hung up that your parent wore these new. fit well. durability of white shoes is questionable, but find shoe white polish to cover scuffs and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: John Forest

customer_reviews.title: Stan Smith Lives
customer_reviews.text: Get a half-size smaller than your actual size. This material is reflective fyi...kinda kool. The color is really bright...as in I wasn't expecting it to be soooo bright.
customer_reviews.author: Renriqué M Primus

customer_reviews.title: Faint reflective blue! Great choice for something a little different.
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Fit great, looked great, lasted a while until I destroyed them at a muddy music festival (even then they're still wearable!) I'm not sure what the other reviewers expected as the description states that these are a slight blue. These are made of some kind of very faint reflective material that's only visible under a camera flash. They fit as expected and they're pretty comfortable. Great choice if you want Stan Smiths but don't want to get the same accent green that everyone else is getting.
customer_reviews.author: Enoch Wong

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great shoe. But it was much too small. I have a high arch and instep and wide feed. My foot stretched this shoe to the max and it never became comfortable. If these came in E/2E it would probably be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.  Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Runs narrow. Oddly, both (US) Sizes 19 & 20 are same width, and neither are D (M). Returned for refund.

customer_reviews.title: other than that happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit me a bit big so I added a cushioned inner sole which seems to have taken care of the issue...other than that happy with these shoes...only other issue which I can't blame on the sneakers is that they open up on the sides but that happens I think due to me having flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2 days, bad blister on my heel.
customer_reviews.text: They look good but the rear leather is so tough I got a blister through my sock. Now that I wore them they are dirty and I don't know if I can return them.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Need backups now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knowing what they were going to feel like. Great addition for those that like clean white shoes that stay that way. Stays cleaner longer than most other white sneakers IMO. I will be buying many of these in the days to come.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shim

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: In my life I’ve purchase this particular model of adidas, like the casual look and feel. Price is great best you can find online. The only reason this product does get 5 stars and I maybe me just being picky the leather on one of the toes of the sneaker isn’t smooth and maybe that may reflect the price Bc these are usually $70-$85.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Bold statement
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft the leather of these feels. Obviously not for everyday use unless you use pink all the time. When I do wear them, I always get a nice compliment. I even took a nice picture for my Instagram account!
customer_reviews.author: wilfredo

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, but great product
customer_reviews.text: Love Adidas and the design, but make sure to purchase a size smaller. These shoes appear to run large. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: M. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size, poor quality, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Stan Smith's in the past. This pair was very disappointing. Size 8 were ordered, size 7.5 delivered. Upon examination the insoles were loose, cheap, thin foam pieces. The uppers were cheap, looked like vinyl and not well made.
customer_reviews.author: G. Porter

customer_reviews.title: The original
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I haven’t worn Stan’s since the early 70s, but they still fit like an old friend. Don’t worry - they’re the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: jes.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers at an equally great price!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are usually sold in some high-end retailers for a lot more money than I paid on Amazon. In fact was able to purchase two pair and a pair for my wife and we are both smiling!
customer_reviews.author: beora williams

customer_reviews.title: #1 tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Light, comfortable, great arch support, well made. Love these shoes! They led me to may victory's on the tennis courts too. Great slide control needed for tennis. I wear them until the soles, tops of toes, or side leather wear holes thru them, which takes year-s. I only wish they came in more colors. I am so pleased the shoes structure is the same after all these years. Honesty for real tennis shoes fans these are number #1in my book.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: A true classic
customer_reviews.text: A classic, beautiful, comfortable sneaker at an $80 price point. What’s not to like? These sneakers distress really nicely and fit into a variety of styles! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ransom Note

customer_reviews.title: Great retro sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Stan Smith are a great retros to have but if you order a 10.5 and receive a 10. That’s not good.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Simple classic.
customer_reviews.text: A time machine classic. Not a fan of nine neon colors on shoes. This is the solution.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Classic Look
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, great fit, classic looks, what could be better?
customer_reviews.author: Tom R

customer_reviews.title: SLEEK AND STYLISH
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit like a glove and are so fashion forward
customer_reviews.author: David A Rice

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly Like The Old Ones But Close Enough
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear these in the 1980s in college. The ones back then were slightly heavier and the leather was thicker and not as flexible. The current ones break in more easily because of the thinner leather and also provide more flexibility initially. Other than that, they seem pretty much the same. I haven’t had them long enough to comment on longevity but initial quality seems OK.
customer_reviews.author: LightHiker

customer_reviews.title: Stan Smiths a Classic never goes out of style
customer_reviews.text: As i said in my title Stan Smiths are a classic which I've worn since my uncle George introduced me to them in 1978. I have had a pair in my wardrobe ever since and have expanded to collecting other variation in color or styling in the last few years. Buy a pair and enjoy you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sneaker with a wider toe box and these fit the bill. The price was definitely a plus. Sometimes it pays to have big feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Están muy bien
customer_reviews.text: I liked the tennis shoes a lot, only that they were a little bigger than expected, but in conclusion I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A straight line design and the green logos on the back and tongue match the white leather well. I don't play sports yet I purchased these shoes for casual dress and I believe they match any color of kaki pants. A clean cut and nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: LONG RUNNER

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: classic style with above avg quality (partially stitched) for 70. cant complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Flex that gold.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes to look like a G. Or flex and floss like a boss.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and stylish, white is the way to go. Color ways are hard sometimes to match with outfits but the white is bold yet compliments whatever pieces you are wearing during the day. Adidas did a great job making a color most people are reluctant to wear work on a versatile shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Benson

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect if you follow the men's size scale
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my preteen and she loves them! Fit perfect if you follow the men's size scale.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Colorway
customer_reviews.text: This particular Stan Smith colorway is apparently a 2017 release & it looks Awesome in daylight. I've noticed people admiring them. Other than that, it's true to size & very comfortable. You might have to take good care to maintain the suede material & the shade.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ramchandani

customer_reviews.title: same as 200 sneakers, but for a third of the price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and hard to destroy, Stan Smith forever. The fake crocodile renders nicely. Only issue is people usually don't see me well from the back because of the camo.
customer_reviews.author: ronan carrein

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect. I love them. I bought a size 5 and they fit perfectly. Not to small but not too big either. The only thing is that the show box did come damaged. But other than that they are great, especially since I only paid $28. It was a great bargain find.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as expected. It's a nice plain white shoe. Nothing fancy. The price on Amazon was better than anywhere else (as usual).
customer_reviews.author: Bryan1117

customer_reviews.title: i have narrow feet and this is one of the better fitting sneakers i have had and this particular styling ...
customer_reviews.text: stan smith has alway been a go to sneaker for me. i have narrow feet and this is one of the better fitting sneakers i have had and this particular styling is a great look.
customer_reviews.author: st.leroy

customer_reviews.title: Some folks indicated that this updated version fits smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: Some folks indicated that this updated version fits smaller than usual but I didn't find this to be the case. These fit exactly the same as my old pair of Stan Smiths that are about 8 years old. I had ordered (and had to return) a 1/2 size larger based on other reviews. Hopefully these will last as long as my other pair.
customer_reviews.author: JPT

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish. Definitely recommend if you know how to rock this one
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Timeless
customer_reviews.text: Like the clean look. Goes well with a dressier modern timeless look.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Chan

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the shoes that he ordered is fine. They fit well
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves Stan Smith Sneakers. This is probably his 4th pair. He is older so he puts in arch supports. The quality of the shoes that he ordered is fine. They fit well, and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Big and Tall
customer_reviews.text: Big and tall sizes. I need a 16 shoe and found it on amazon. Sooo glad they added a big and tall section!!!
customer_reviews.author: LT Lindz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the classics to spruce up your style
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the classics to spruce up your style. This is a fashion sneaker and not for exercise. You can wear it with shorts, jeans and for the especially fashionable . . . with a suit. The beauty of these kicks is their simplicity. As a tip I when I wear all white sneakers I always keep a travel pack of baby wipes with me just in case they get dirty or I'm stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Vidiella

customer_reviews.title: STYLISH AND VERSATILE...
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE SOME OF THE MOST STYLISH AND VERSATILE SHOES EVERY GUY SHOULD HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Clay Dennis

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These classics fit as excellent! Fell great and stylish and super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: John Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Classic show, goes with everything, fits well, feels comfortable. Be ready to treat and clean often, they will stain easily just like you would expect. Great, awesome looking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: CompGeek75

customer_reviews.title: CAMO!
customer_reviews.text: I have twelve pairs of Stan Smith sneaks, humble brag, these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: fixedgear

customer_reviews.title: Black on Black Adidas Stan Smith
customer_reviews.text: The Adidas Stan Smith Black shoes were delivered on time as expected. The shoes are an original icon. They run narrow so I got a size up as I have wide feet. They are comfortable and go with sporty attire as well as business casual. I really like the all black color. I love the fit and will order another color.
customer_reviews.author: DHaynes

customer_reviews.title: hate them, the glow and material is very plastic like
customer_reviews.text: got the neon ones by mistake, they are horrible, and even if you like the finish, they are so plastic like that if you step you get creases everywhere looks terrible, and i dont think it would last long
customer_reviews.author: emiliano

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wrede

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Stan Smith Sneaker
product_meta.description: These men's shoes put an artful twist on the essential style of the '72 original with an embossed upper and camo-print heel patch. They keep the low-profile cup sole and clean trim that have always been the hallmark of the franchise.
feature_bullets: An authentic version of the iconic 1972 tennis classic.

Top to bottom, these Stan Smith shoes capture the essential style of the '70s original, with the artful leather build, low-profile cupsole and clean trim that have always been the hallmark of the franchise.
Features a rubber cupsole and leather lining
Full grain leather upper with lace closure
Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite sockliner; Leather upper
